item.title: S02E05: The Further Adventures of Bubbly the Bubble Car
item.description:
Session Date: 08/05/2017

This session begins on the north shore of what is conclusively revealed to be an island, and ends back in the Corpselvator, ascending to the mysterious Fourth Floor. Along the way some stuff happens, including:

item.title: S02E04: The Corpselvator
item.description:
Session Date: 7/15/2017

The party continues to explore the mysterious floating Eld structure (Area 3,) and —whenever the DM manages to remember it— continue to be intermittently interrupted by overwhelming screams of pain and anguish. Maybe they’ll eventually to get to the top of the building and find out who’s making all the noise?

item.title: S02E03: The Tortured God's Wail
item.description:
Session Date: 6/4/2017

The party scrambles to learn the basics of bubble car operation, fleeing the scene of Session 11’s near-TPK and heading northwest into the mists (off the shore of Area 15.)

item.title: Campaign Goals
item.description: Stuff (besides killing monsters) that will earn XP. The entire party earns XP when a goal is achieved, even if the goal is linked to a specific character. Achieved! S02E06: Meet a starlord (not that starlord) (Ovek) S02E06: Effectively use his fly ability (Ovek) S02E05: Charm foe into attacking an ally (Ovek) S02E04: Obtain wearable Eld ceramic platemail (Marvus) S02E03: Learn to pilot the bubble car (Ovek)

item.title: S02E02: Tower Assault
item.description:
Session Date: 4/22/2017

The party has decided to ascend an Eldish tower and commandeer a bubble car parked on it’s roof. A presumably easy task, considering the single guard.

item.title: S02E01: City of the Eld
item.description:
Session Date: 3/25/2017

Fresh off their successful home invasion of the EMERALD ENCHANTER, intrepid Thulian adventurers Flynn the Fortunate, Marvus the Wolf, and Ovek the Tall, along with their loyal half-beast henchman Grimbok, head into the JUNGLE OF BURA for some routine archaeological looting. Unfortunately, the targeted structure –ruins of the elvish LAPIS OBSERVATORY– is found to be currently occupied by the ELD, and the party is sucked into an INTERDIMENSIONAL RIFT (It was Ovek’s fault.)
